export var url="http://mfc-demo.us-east-1.elasticbeanstalk.com/public/";export var doPost=function doPost(setter,data,endpoint){fetch("".concat(url).concat(endpoint),{method:"POST",body:data,headers:{"Content-type":"application/json; charset=UTF-8"}}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(data){return setter(data);});//setter(response)
};export var storeData=function storeData(data){localStorage.setItem("mfc",JSON.stringify({data:data}));};export var handleRequest=function handleRequest(setLogin,data,endpoint){return doPost(setLogin,data,endpoint);};export var handleLogout=function handleLogout(url){localStorage.removeItem("mfc");window.location=url;};export var getData=function getData(){var data=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("mfc"));return JSON.stringify(data.data.user);};
